pkgmetadata.longdescription: Loading Criteo Data into R // Aims at loading Criteo online advertising campaign data into R. Criteo http://www.criteo.com/ is an online advertising service that enables advertisers to display commercial ads to web users. The package provides an authentication process for R with the Criteo API http://kb.criteo.com/ advertising/content/5/27/en/api.html. Moreover, the package features an interface to query campaign data from the Criteo API. The data can be downloaded and will be transformed into a R data frame.
